Introduction.Title: A 'more like this' feature for the most relevant web results
Introduction.Description: Dataprovider.com's Search By Example feature allows you to start with the URL of your best customer, closest competitor, or dream client to find similar companies and leads globally.

Benefit.Title: Discover high-quality accounts with custom lead lists
Benefit.Description: With just one URL, generate a dataset of matching profiles, including firmographics, geographic information, and contact details.

Benefit.Title: Understand your competition even better
Benefit.Description: Explore the industry at a local or global level by generating lists of competing companies, products, or services.
